data.title: New England Preparatory School Athletic Council (MA)
data.meta_description: EIL – Eastern Independent League Fairchester Athletic Association The Founders League GIL – Girls Independent League HVAL – Housatonic Valley Athletic League…
data.meta_site_name: New England Preparatory School Athletic Council (MA)
data.text: NEPSAC was established in 1942 as an organization of athletic directors from accredited New England independent schools. While the Association does not function as a regulatory or oversight body (like the NCAA or state public high school associations), NEPSAC does sanction New England championship events in many sports and provides guidance in a variety of issues involving interscholastic athletics in our schools.
